ACZ.JO.summary: Arden Capital Limited, an investment holding company, operates in the hospitality, real estate, and logistics sectors in Zimbabwe. It owns and manages Victoria Falls hotel, a five star hotel with 161 rooms; Kingdom at Victoria Falls, a three star hotel with 294 rooms; and Elephant Hills, Victoria Falls, a four star hotel with 276 rooms, as well as Monomotapa Hotel Harare, a four star hotel with 243 rooms. The company also owns other hotels and resorts that comprise 83 rooms, as well as recreational harbours in Lake Kariba and game farms. In addition, it provides fuel transportation services. Further, the company engages in the property development and consulting businesses. The company was formerly known as Brainworks Limited and changed its name to Arden Capital Limited in December 2019.
